fields.description:
There are a number of APIs that still need to be rewritten to use the new declare() or setObject() functions:

* Ti/Accelerometer.js
* -Ti/Analytics.js- DONE!
* -Ti/API.js- DONE!
* -Ti/App.js- DONE!
* -Ti/App/Properties.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Blob.js- DONE!
* Ti/Database.js
* Ti/Database/DB.js
* Ti/Database/ResultSet.js
* -Ti/Facebook.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Facebook/LoginButton.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Filesystem.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Filesystem/File.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Geolocation.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Locale.js- DONE!
* Ti/Map.js
* Ti/Map/Annotation.js
* Ti/Map/MapView.js
* Ti/Media/AudioPlayer.js
* Ti/Media/Sound.js
* -Ti/Network.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Network/HTTPClient.js- DONE!
* -Ti/Utils.js- Done!
* -Ti/XML.js- DONE!
* Ti/Yahoo.js
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Convert APIs from old syntax to new declare()/setObject() syntax

comments.body: Closing ticket due to MobileWeb no longer being supported.
